name: Psychocat: The Door
storyline:
Our little furry ball Zag is trapped in a chaotic world and catching the door is his only way to find peace & redemption. 
 
The game features a unique control-reversal mechanic that messes with your head as you try to dodge obstacles in 20+ psychedelic levels. 
 
How many tries will it take you to catch the door ?
summary: Psychocat: The Door is a psychedelic action game that messes with your head and expands your consciousness.
